SIPPS is a program developed & run primarily by graduate students, postdocs, and staff in Columbia's Psychology Department.

## Core Team

<br>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/ana.jpg" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Ana DiGiovanni</b></u> is a PhD student in the Couples Lab. She studies social support processes and interpersonal emotion regulation strategies (i.e., co-rumination) that occur in close relationships, especially during times of stress.
<p> <img src="/images/email.png" class="icon"> [email](mailto:amd2323@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}
</div>
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/claudia.png" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Claudia Espinoza-Heredia</b></u> is a PhD student working with Dima Amso in the DCN Lab, interested in the role of environmental factors and experience on early brain maturation.
<p> <img src="/images/email.png" class="icon"> [email](mailto:ce2435@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}
</div>
</div>
<br><br>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/camille.jpg" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Camille Gasser</b></u> is a PhD student in the Davachi Lab, interested in how our prior knowledge about the world shapes our ability to learn and remember new information.
<p> <img src="/images/email.png" class="icon"> [email](mailto:cg3083@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}
</div>
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/manasi.jpg" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Manasi Jayakumar</b></u> (she/her) is a PhD student in the Aly Lab, interested in interactions between attention and memory, and the neural mechanisms underlying these interactions.
<p> <img src="/images/email.png" class="icon"> [email](mailto:mj2873@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}
</div>
</div>
<br><br>
<div class="row">
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/arlene.png" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Arlene Lormestoire</b></u> is a PhD student in the Davachi Lab, interested in how we leverage commonalities across distinct episodic experiences in support of new learning.
<p> <img src="/images/email.png" class="icon"> [email](mailto:al4201@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}
</div>
<div class="col-sm-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/ben.jpg" style="border:1px solid #A9A9A9"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-4">
<u><b>Ben Silver</b></u> is a PhD student in the SCAN Lab. He's interested in how we learn and update our knowledge of the self and others, and how emotion motivates cognition.
